ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
ack.p: We thank the Hawaii Division of Forestry and Wildlife for allowing access to the research sites. We thank W. Pitt of the US Dept of Agriculture (USDA) Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service for providing critical support for implementing and maintaining rat removal treatments, and field technicians B. Hwang, D. Leopold, K. Francisco, C. Morrison, L. Nakagawa, J. Pang‐Ching, and R. De Mattos. We thank the USDA Forest Service Inst. of Pacific Islands Forestry for providing essential logistical and vehicle support, office, and laboratory space. We thank the US Food and Drug Administration and M. Allard for providing a GS FLX + to CCG, and Roche 454 Life Sciences for providing a GS Junior to CCG and additional support. We thank N. McInerney for guidance in molecular procedures, and S. Davies, N. Kurata, and K. Stewardson for help in the initial phase of the molecular project.
